pageProduct.name: Scholl Callous Removal Medicated Disc Pads System 4 pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Scholl Callus Removal Pads medicated disc system, effective removal and immediate cushioning relief. Extra-soft pad, Hypoallergenic adhesive.

Scholl Callus Removal Pads are especially developed for use on calluses. Contains fast acting medicated discs with Time-Release Action.




- The disc ensures only the specific problem area is treated, without affecting the surrounding skin




- The super soft pads provide cushioning and protection




- Especially suitable for sensitive skin

Boxed Contents: 4 Pads, 4 Medicated Discs

Size: 4 Pack

Warnings

Do not apply if the area around the callus is inflamed or if the skin is broken. Do not apply to healthy skin. Do not use if you are sensitive to aspirin. Do not use if you have diabetes or impaired circulation. Children under the age of sixteen years should seek medical advice before use. Do not use continuously for more than two weeks, exceopt after medical advice. Discontinue use and remove dressing if excessive discomfort or irritation is experienced or if sensitivity develops. For external use only. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Contains: Each medicated disc contains Salicylic Acid 38.01mg (equiv. 40% w/w)

Directions

Feet should be clean and dry. Remove disc and pad from backing paper. Place adhesive surface of medicated disc firmly over centre of callus and cover with pad. Repeat treatment daily until callus is easily removed.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C. If carton seal is broken, do not use.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 21 PAP
